===Etymology===
{{Han simp|國|f=或|t=玉}}

In this simplified form, this character consists of 玉, the Chinese character for [[jade]] (or precious stone or [[gem]]) (representing the emperor), enclosed by the character meaning "erect," "proud," or "upright". In the Kangxi Dictionary of 1716 the character 国 is not included, but other characters like 囯, 囶, 圀 and 䆐 are. 國 is the original character.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|くに|kyu=國}}

# a [[land]], a large [[place]]
